text: Maighread nighean Lachlainn (c. 1660–?) was an eighteenth-century Scottish Gaelic poet from Mull. In her poetry, she mentions the Jacobite risings. == Poetry == * Cha choma leam fhìn co dhiù sin (c. 1698) * Dh' fhalbh mo chadal a' smaointinn * Gaoir nam ban Muileach (1716): An Lasair, pg.60–71. * Gun d' fhuair mi sgeul 's chan àicheam e * Mo cheist an Leathanach mòdhar == References == * Black, R. (ed.) 2001. An Lasair: An Anthology of Eighteenth- century Gaelic Verse (Edinburgh: Birlinn) == External links == * PhD thesis (University of Glasgow) by Anna Frater on Scottish Gaelic poetry written by women before 1750 (pdf) Category:1660s births Category:Date of birth uncertain Category:Year of death missing Category:17th-century Scottish poets Category:18th-century Scottish poets Category:17th-century Scottish women writers Category:17th-century writers Category:18th-century British women writers Category:17th-century Scottish Gaelic poets Category:Scottish women poets Category:People from the Isle of Mull Category:18th-century deaths Category:Scottish Gaelic women poets Category:18th-century Scottish Gaelic poets
title: Maighread nighean Lachlainn
